runs.comm: length ball outside off and Gambhir gets the innings off to a cracking start, staying in his crease and driving on the up through the gap at cover
better length around off stump, Gambhir drives towards mid-off
good length on off and middle at 139 kph, Gambhir gets behind the line and blocks

a bit too full and on the pads, poor line when fine leg is in the circle, Gambhir misses the flick but the ball hits the pads and runs towards the boundary. Amla gives chase and dives but can't save it
nudged off the pads towards square leg
good length outside off stump, Sehwag prods at the ball shaping away from him and is beaten
good length on leg and middle, Gambhir dabs close on the leg side and runs the single before Morne can run across and prevent it
Sehwag's whipped the ball with his wrists from middle stump through midwicket
short of a length but on the pads, Sehwag stays on the back foot and flicks the ball behind square
good length outside off stump, Sehwag drops the ball close on the off side and runs
fuller length outside off, Gambhir leans forward and opens the face to play towards point
Gambhir backs away to a short of a length ball and slaps it awkwardly over mid-on, it was a touch slower I think and he was early on the shot
Sehwag throws his bat at an outswinger outside off stump and is beaten, he was looking to drive through cover
good length and bang on middle and off stump, Sehwag stays back and hits the ball towards cover
Sehwag misses the glance against a short of a length ball and gets hit on the thigh for a leg bye towards square leg
the slower ball outside off stump, Gambhir waits on it and opens the face to steer towards point
Gambhir tries to cut one that's too close to him, the ball doesn't bounce either and Gambhir bottom edges it past his stumps
Gambhir misses the pull and looks away as the short ball crashes into his shoulder and goes over AB de Villiers for four leg byes
Sehwag slashes at a short of a length ball wide outside off and connects with nothing, no footwork as is the norm with Sehwag
he's got an inside edge on to the pad, Sehwag tries to whip a full ball angling into middle stump at 145 kph and missed

bowled him, off the inside edge! Middle stump is flat on the ground. Morkel delivered at 146kph, the length was a bit full to be staying in the crease to, Gambhir tried to make room and cut but the ball thudded on to his bat and then on to the stumps
Kohli starts with an outstanding cover drive, leaning forward to punch the length ball through the gap in the in field. The fielder at cover took some pace off the ball before it got through
short of a length outside off, Kohli stays back and plays towards backward point
Kohli moves forward and punches a good length ball to point
a bit too short and Sehwag swats it behind square and to the boundary
opens the face and steers the ball to third man
Kohli tries to blast the ball square on the off side but misses
short of a length but not short enough to pull, Kohli mis-times the shot on the leg side

caught behind! Kohli moved across his stumps to a short of a length ball that climbed on him and he ended up gloving the glance, AB moved quickly to his left and caught it. India in trouble now. Kohli was cramped for room by how much that ball rose
Kallis fires in another short one, Rohit ducks and weaves like his trying to avoid a haymaker
Sehwag backs away and cuts the arm ball towards cover
he's come down the track and swung hard, lofting that ball over the wide long-on boundary. He didn't get to the pitch of the ball but he hit cleanly through the line
bowled him! Sehwag's six and out! He came down the pitch once again and swung in hope across the line. The ball was much slower. Sehwag was beaten by flight and the pace and Peterson hit off stump
leans forward and plays the ball towards point
stays on the back foot and plays on the off side
steps out of his crease and flicks towards midwicket, where the fielder makes a sharp save
Rohit wanted to turn that on the leg side but ended up playing towards point
played back to the bowler from the crease
Yuvraj waits for the ball to come to him and whips through midwicket
Rohit was in position a bit too early for the cut, the ball stopped on him. He bottomed edged it behind point
that is some timing! Yuvraj Singh leaned forward, got under the ball and lofted it with the turn over the cover boundary. All timing
and now he's been beaten outside off stump
played from the crease to midwicket
pushed off the front foot to long off
played off the back foot to cover
he's smashed it! The ball was quicker and Yuvraj slog-swept it off the front foot flat and far over deep midwicket
on the pads and Yuvraj stays back to work the ball past the fielder at short fine leg
bowled flat on middle stump, Rohit defends towards the bowler
Yuvraj goes back and works the ball off his pads behind square
that's too short and Rohit pulls along the ground to the fielder on the midwicket boundary, poor placement
this is good placement, Yuvraj goes back into his crease and pulls hard, beating Kallis on the deep midwicket boundary because of the power with which he hit it
pulled off the back foot towards long on
Rohit leans forward and defends back to the bowler
worked off the pads through square leg
short and wide outside off, a real hit-me ball, Rohit cuts well but Faf pulls off a superb save at point
shot! Rohit sees mid-off in the circle so he backs away towards leg and lofts the ball over the in-field to the boundary
Rohit pushes the ball towards mid-off and runs the single once extra cover fails to cut off the shot
full ball outside off, Yuvraj square drives towards point where a fumble from Faf allows the single
good length on off stump, nudged towards the off side for a single
bowled him! Morkel bowled a full ball and it was a little slower too. Yuvraj tried to flick and missed, he lost his off stump
tossed up on off stump, Rohit drives to cover
bowled full and straight, Raina drives back to the bowler
Raina drives to long off for a single
Faf leaps to his right to cut off a shot that was heading to long-on
Rohit leans forward and drives towards long on
a bit shorter and Raina punches towards wide mid-on, it never gets there because Faf moves to his left and dives full length to save the run
over-steps and delivers a length ball on the pads, Rohit flicks through midwicket, free-hit coming up ...
the short ball and Raina pulls at thin air
a low full toss outside off stump, Raina reaches for it and hits towards deep point

caught, no it's been dropped! Rohit slogged at a good length ball and hit it with the toe of the bat over the bowler's head. Botha ran towards the catch from long on, Behardien went from long off. Botha got to it and caught the ball while running at full tilt but couldn't hold on once he tumbled to the ground
he's smashed it back at the bowler and Morkel doesn't spot the ball, it goes past him and towards the straight boundary
played towards point
Raina moves towards the leg side to create room and loft the length ball inside out towards the cover boundary, it nearly goes all the way
driven off the back foot through cover
Raina reaches out for the wide ball outside off and lofts over the infield at extra cover, long off runs to his right and fields
the quicker and flatter ball on the pads, Raina flicks in the air but behind the fielder at square leg, beating Botha
cut off the back foot through point
tossed up into the right-hander, nudged off the pads behind square
played off the pads towards Morne at short fine leg
Rohit waits and dabs the ball late, placing it past Morne Morkel at short third man who gave up the chase pretty early
moves forward and across to drive the ball towards long on
punched off the back foot towards deep midwicket
the leading edge lobs back towards the bowler but falls safe, Raina closed the face too early
Raina jumps down the pitch and outside leg stump, lofting the ball inside out with pinpoint placement towards the extra cover boundary
a high full toss and Raina doesn't try to hit it too hard, he chips it and places it right over the bowler's head, Faf runs to his left from long-on and dives to save the boundary
a full toss and Rohit leans forward and drives through midwicket
Raina pushes forward and punches through cover
Rohit stays in his crease and punches towards cover
bowled flat and fast on middle and leg, Raina stays in his crease and plays in front of square leg
Rohit backs away towards leg and hits through point
Raina steps out of his crease and drives the ball to long on
Raina swings across the line but misses and gets hit on the pad, the ball pitched outside leg stump from round the wicket
Raina steps out of his crease and hits towards deep cover
Rohit leans forward and nudges down the ground to long on
Raina heaves across the line but mis-hits the ball to square leg
Raina steps out of his crease, the bowler sees him coming and bowls it wide, Raina reaches for it and lofts towards wide long off
lbw! Rohit tries to sweep one that is much too full on off stump, he misses and is absolutely plumb, he goes after failing to get out of third gear, 25 off 27 balls isn't good enough
Raina makes room to a length ball and lofts it over the fielder at mid-off, he knew his field and exploited it
Rain tries to run the short of a length ball to third man, it was too close to him and he was beaten
steered off the back foot towards third man
Dhoni moves across his stumps to a good length ball on off and middle and plays towards midwicket
Raina backs away towards leg and throws his bat at a wide delivery outside off, he bottom edges it into the ground and towards the gully position, AB moves to his left and fields
Dhoni slogs at a short of a length ball outside off, he misses completely
in the blockhole on off stump, played from the crease through cover
a very low full toss, Raina stays in his crease and drives to long off
in the blockhole outside off stump, Dhoni gives it a thrash and drives through cover
Raina slogs at a short ball, dragging it from outside off towards deep square where Behardien comes running in and drops a simple chance
Raina cashes in by whipping a fuller ball off his pads to the wide long-on boundary
Dhoni moves across his stumps, latches on to a length ball and pulls it over midwicket towards the cow corner boundary
a straight full toss and Dhoni gets an outside edge through backward point, he was looking to hit down the ground
what a shot that is, Dhoni stands his ground to a short ball and pulls it flat past the bowler, Steyn ducked out of the way, that would have taken his head off
Dhoni moves towards the off side to smash a straight full toss towards Duminy at deep midwicket, he absolutely smashed it
slogs across the line and manages to hit the length ball through square leg, Dhoni runs hard for another double
in the blockhole outside off stump, Dhoni is beaten, Steyn bowls a good last ball to end an expensive over
a low full toss and Raina hits it through midwicket for a single
a full toss outside off stump and Dhoni doesn't place it well, hitting it to the fielder at long off
short of a length and Raina pulls towards the fielder at long-on, it reaches him on the first bounce
how has he hit that for four? Dhoni moved his front foot forward and towards the off side to sweep a full ball to the square leg boundary
Dhoni plays the helicopter shot but hits it along the ground to mid-on, only a single

the slower ball ball around off stump, Raina drives along the ground to long off and runs the single, Dhoni sprints back for the second, the throw is to the striker's end, where Raina dives full stretch with his bat outstretched. He was so far out that AB had enough time to miss the first attempt at breaking the stumps and do it on the second. Raina was just short
